page.title: 10A TYPICAL DAY._C.BONTOFT.10.
page.content: Monday morning, a typical day.I got up at 7.30,dressed and went downstairs.I turned on the video and watched "Open all hours".After that I had a bowl of Frosties and a cup of coffee then I cleaned my teeth and got my school stuff ready.When it was five to nine I set off from my house.School opens at nine fifteen.When I got in we sat down then the hymn books came round.Mr. Elmer said,"Page37_Jesus friend of little children."After prayers we did Maths.At a quarter to eleven it was playtime.We did our English workbooks after play.Lunch was at twelve fifteen with a break for thirty minutes.Then it was back to work again.We read until two o clock then we began to write a story.This is the story I am writing.After break at three o clock Mr.Elmer handed round a tub with a caterpillar in it and asked us what it
